name: Bbcode
body:
# BBCode Class for PHP5

BBCode Class is one of the powerfull BBCode parsers. It's very simple to use it.

Go to [https://github.com/develogix/bbcode](https://github.com/develogix/bbcode) to see it.

It can be used with Symfony2 too !
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
